mission.title: Our mission
mission.text: We believe gift-giving should be joyful, not stressful. Our AI-powered platform helps you find thoughtful, meaningful gifts that truly resonate with the people you care about.

howWeHelp.title: How we help
howWeHelp.text: By understanding the recipient's personality, interests, and your relationship, we curate personalized gift recommendations that go beyond generic suggestions. No more random purchases—just thoughtful gifts they'll actually love.

howItWorks.q: How does the AI gift recommendation work?
howItWorks.a: Our AI analyzes your answers about the recipient's personality, interests, age, and the occasion to match them with gifts from our curated database. We consider factors like emotional impact, practicality, and your budget to provide personalized suggestions.

free.a: Yes! Taking the quiz and getting recommendations is completely free. We earn a small commission when you purchase through our affiliate links, at no extra cost to you.

accuracy.a: Our recommendations are based on extensive research and AI analysis. While no system is perfect, we continuously improve our algorithms based on user feedback to provide increasingly relevant suggestions.

privacy.a: We take privacy seriously. Your quiz answers are used only to generate recommendations. We don't sell your personal data. See our Privacy Policy for details.

affiliate.a: When you click a product link and make a purchase, we may earn a small commission from the retailer. This doesn't affect the price you pay—it's simply how we keep the service free.
